Motion to Discharge Committee Filed by Murphy. Discharge Petition No: 22.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to provide that the maximum daily benefit will be the daily equivalent of the maximum weekly benefit payable under the State unemployment compensation law.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to provide that the maximum daily benefit payable under such Act shall be the daily equivalent of the maximum weekly benefit payable under the State unemployment compensation law.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to provide that the maximum daily benefit will be the daily equivalent of the maximum weekly benefit payable under the State unemployment compensation law.
